name: Energy Model Lighting Agent
description: Modify energy model lighting information, including adjust lighting power density (LPD) and add or remove daylighting sensors in a space

skills.name: Adjust LPD
example: Reduce office spaces' lighting power density to 0.6 W/ft2
Increase the energy model lighting power density by 5%

skills.name: Daylighting Sensor
skills.description: Add or remove a daylighting sensor
example: Install daylighting sensors to the building
Remove all daylighting sensors in this building
